name: Elixir Games
description: $ELIX is the native token for the elixir.app platform and will have many use cases, short and long term, including: Guaranteed allocation to invest in top games in our Launchpad, providing incubation to the selected companies. Staking program with RNG boosts in APYs based on user's tier level. Access to exclusive airdrops from Elixir Platform games. Voting rights over the selection of new games to be incubated or launched. Access to exclusive features and events in social metaverse spaces. Premium features at Elixir Game Platform. Payment method (cashback) for our marketplace integrated with all video games of the ELIXIR launcher (SDK). Access to the season pass of Elixir.
